game.name: Cubic Blitz
game.shortDescription: Cubic Blitz is an isometric puzzle game where you control a cube and solve loads of hand-crafted levels. With the power of paint, sponges, and much more, your task is simple: PAINT THE WORLD.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cubic Blitz is an isometric puzzle game where you control a cube and solve loads of hand-crafted levels. With the power of paint, sponges, and much more, your task is simple: PAINT THE WORLD.
